categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Twi'lek Jedi General served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. She was killed in battle in 19 BBY while leading a clone trooper charge. CT-5539 "Hock" picked up her body and continued the charge. Hock later reflected on her death, thinking that while Jedi were fearless warriors, they were still capable of making mistakes. The Jedi General was a Rutian Twi'lek.
The Twi'lek Jedi General appears in the flashback portion of the 2013 Dark Horse comic Darth Vader and the Cry of Shadows 1.
